price: İman etmeyenlere şöyle de: "Elinizden gelen her şeyi yapın, ben de yapacağım."
arabic: وَقُل لِّلَّذِينَ لَا يُؤۡمِنُونَ ٱعۡمَلُواْ عَلَىٰ مَكَانَتِكُمۡ إِنَّا عَٰمِلُونَ

version.title: Turkish translation - Rowwad Tanslation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com in 1440 H.

meta.transliteration: waqul lilladhīna lā yu'minūna iʿ'malū ʿalā makānatikum innā ʿāmilūna
